testcase.classname: BAHMNI EMR FOR CLINICS New Patient Page
testcase.name: Verify New Patient page
testcase.system-out: Given user on BAHMNI welcome page...........................................passed When user clicks Clinical Service option....................................passed And user enters username "superman".........................................passed And user enters password "Admin123".........................................passed And user selects location "Bahmni Clinic"...................................passed When user clicks on Login...................................................passed When user clicks Registration option........................................passed When user clicks Create New option..........................................passed And user enters firstname "Sayeed"..........................................passed And user enters lastname "khan".............................................passed And user selects gender "Male"..............................................passed And user selects birthdate "15-06-1996".....................................passed When user clicks on Save....................................................passed Then page should create patinet Id..........................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Welcome page
testcase.system-out: Given user on BAHMNI welcome page...........................................passed When user gets the title of the page........................................passed Then page title should be "Bahmni"..........................................passed

testcase.name: Click on Clinical Service in welcome page
testcase.system-out: Given user on BAHMNI welcome page...........................................passed And user finds "Clinical Service" option....................................passed When user clicks Clinical Service option....................................passed Then page should navigate to Login Page.....................................passed
